hero.name: Haythem Ayadi
hero.title: Civil Engineer
hero.description: Engineer specialized in offshore design offices, I have over 7 years of experience in the design and calculation of reinforced concrete structures. Used to collaborating with demanding French companies, I combine rigor, technical mastery and attention to detail. Resident in Asnières-sur-Seine (7 rue du Fossé de L'aumône), I am now looking for an opportunity in France to put my expertise at the service of ambitious and sustainable projects.

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: My background and my passion for civil engineering
about.intro: With 7 years of experience in offshore engineering offices, I specialize in the design and analysis of reinforced concrete structures for complex projects in marine environments.
about.specialization: Reinforced concrete buildings for offshore environments
about.mission: Design durable and safe structures that withstand extreme offshore environmental conditions while complying with the strictest French and international standards.

technicalItems.name: Structural calculation
technicalItems.description: Analysis and sizing of reinforced concrete structures

items.company: FAZ Project (Subcontractor Groupe LEGENDRE Construction, STRUCTURISTE, ETTEC & ARES)
items.description: Prepared complex reinforcement drawings for construction projects in France; supervised and mentored drafting technicians & interns; reviewed and validated the team's produced drawings.
achievements: Prepared complex reinforcement drawings for construction projects in France
Supervised and mentored drafting technicians & interns
Reviewed and validated drawings produced by the team
Maintained direct client communication and respected project schedules
Proposed technical solutions adapted to project constraints

projects.title: My Projects
projects.subtitle: Portfolio of civil engineering and offshore projects

items.title: TOUR HEMERA
items.description: Construction of 87 collective housing units, 5 townhouses and commercial spaces. 16-floor tower with 5 levels and 2 staggered basement levels. Awarded the Silver Pyramid. Compliant with RT 2012 thermal regulations.

items.title: ORANGE LABS
items.description: R&D center project for ORANGE – 18,000 m² on a 42,000 m² site. Mixed-use urban development connected to the new Rennes metro line B. The building is designed to HQE standards, combining technological innovation with strong environmental integration.

items.title: NOBLE AGE
items.description: Construction of a post-acute care facility including accommodation, physiotherapy area, balneotherapy, consultation rooms and a day hospital. Features include a balneotherapy area with pool and jacuzzi and cantilevered elements. Insulation applied within formwork and on walls.

items.title: NEW’R
items.description: New residential development of 151 dwellings with fitted offices and shell retail units. The high-rise building (R+18) received a recent architectural award (Silver Pyramid).

items.title: LOTISSEMENT SAUSSURE LOT 4.7
items.description: Development of 74 social housing units and 3 shops. Use of self-cleaning patterned concrete with dark grey pigment. Thermal break SLABE system. BIM execution and multi-technical maintenance provisions.

items.title: HOPITAL DE QUINTIN
items.description: Construction of a 233-bed hospital. Seismic design considerations and tall reinforced concrete shear walls.

items.title: HORIZON MERMOZ
items.description: Delivery of 142 apartments across four buildings with two basement levels. Thermal break systems implemented.

items.title: HOTEL ASNIERES
items.description: 4-star hotel with 117 rooms featuring lifestyle design, including lobby, breakfast room, seminar rooms, coworking space, gym and secure parking. Awarded the Silver Pyramid. Located near Gare Saint-Lazare.

items.title: IDENTITY
items.description: Office building with leisure activities and retail (25,000 m²). Complex geometry including inclined tall walls for the cinema and circular inclined columns; facetted façade geometry with a raw lacquered concrete finish.

items.title: KAPLA
items.description: 1,600 m² of offices and services and 950 m² of retail. Very close to major road links; transport at ground level and TGV station within 10 minutes.

items.title: LA FERME DU COUDRAY
items.description: Construction of 28 owner-occupied units and 38 social rental units across 6 buildings, including one rehabilitation. One basement level, SLABE insulating box and BBC energy performance operation.
items.assetPath: LA FERME DU COUDRAY/LA FERME DU COUDRAY.png

items.title: LE PANORAMIK
items.description: Construction of 127 dwellings and ground-floor retail with a shared basement level and a chapel. External insulation with perforated cladding.

items.title: LE RIVIERA CHESSY
items.description: Art Deco high-end residence of 128 units (studio to 6-room) plus 5 duplex houses. The program includes 194 underground parking spaces.

items.title: LES TERRASSES DU HARAS
items.description: Three-storey residence (R+3) of 24 units including a medical center and ground-floor shops. Apartments range from 2 to 4 rooms and a private underground car park with 73 spaces.
items.assetPath: LES TERRASSES DU HARAS/LES TERRASSES DU HARAS.png

degree.engineerDescription: Final year project titled: Study of a building Ilot WURTZ-JUVISY on ORGE-FRANCE (grade: 16/20)
degree.licenseDescription: Civil Engineering - MARRIOTT project (R+12 & 3SS) - Distinction: Very good

cert.tcfDesc: Test of Knowledge of French - Official language certification
cert.revitDesc: Professional certification in modeling and structural design with Revit Structure

footer.name: Haythem Ayadi
footer.description: Experienced civil engineer specialized in offshore projects, focusing on reinforced concrete structures for marine environments. Actively seeking opportunities in France.

items.description: Design, modeling and calculation of reinforced concrete structures, metal frames and timber structures.
achievements: Preparation of formwork and reinforcement plans (new and rehabilitation)
Writing detailed calculation notes and justification of technical choices
Analysis of tender documents and load path calculation
Coordination between design and execution, compliance with standards
Checking plans and calculations to ensure quality
Technical assistance to site teams and management of adjustments
projects: Gagny kindergarten: load-bearing structures and formwork plans
61 housing Vernon: structural plans for the residential complex
Angerville complex: design and calculation of three buildings

items.company: FAZ-Project (Subcontractor GROUPE LEGENDRE CONSTRUCTION & STRUCTURISTE & ARES-CONCEPT)
items.description: Detailed calculations, reinforcement and drawings for RC elements; elevation plans, sections, plan views; cast-in-place and precast slabs; quantity surveys and takeoffs; base drawings; reading and checking plans.
achievements: Calculation and reinforcement of beams, tie beams, walls, lintels, columns, stiffeners
Elevation plans, sections and plan views of vertical elements and foundations
Design and reinforcement of slabs (in-situ and precast)
Complete quantity surveys and takeoffs of all reinforcement plans
Creation of base drawings from architectural plans
Reading/checking formwork plans and resolving contradictions
projects: GINKO College, Bordeaux: college with gym and staff housing
Grand Paris Line 15 South, Vitry-sur-Seine: infrastructure maintenance
New Conservatory, Clichy-sous-Bois: Music, Dance, Arts
ZAC South Business Park: real estate complex and transport network
129 housing units, Lormont: with underground parking

items.description: Site monitoring, administrative follow-up, safety, team coordination and scheduling.
achievements: Monitoring the arrival of machines/materials until completion
Writing minutes and daily reports
Respecting and checking safety measures on site
Coordinating teams to meet deadlines
Autonomous monitoring of small sites and support for large projects
Planning: formwork, reinforcement, placement of reinforcements, stripping
projects: MARRIOTT Hotel R+12 & 3SS: supervision of key construction phases
